name: Gensokyo Fire Department
description:
As the new firefighter in Gensokyo, your goal is to put out all fires.

Controls:
WASD - Movment
Shift - Run
LMB - "Spray"

Autor: ovROG
Music: Violet Delta

Used things:
https://github.com/vrm-c/UniVRM/tree/master/Assets/VRMShaders (MIT License)
https://github.com/keijiro/StandardTriplanar (Public domain)
https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Roboto (Apache License, Version 2.0.)

Made for Touhou Game Jam 2021 (https://touhou-gamejam.web.app/en/)
